header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED ON REPORT

text.quote: 000: Clause 3, page 2, line 7, leave out “basis” and insert “subject matter”
000: Clause 3, page 2, line 7, at end insert—

“( ) Without prejudice to the generality of subsection (3), the second condition is met if the defendant indicates the subject matter of a letter or article appearing in a newspaper or other publication, and the date when it appeared.”
000: Clause 4, page 2, line 39, leave out subsection (2)
000: Clause 5, page 3, line 35, after “complainant” insert “and wrongful”
000: Clause 5, page 3, line 35, at end insert “including—
text.IndentTwo: (i) why any facts in the statement complained of are untrue; and
(ii) why any opinions in the statement complained of are unsupportable; and
(iii) why the statement has caused or is likely to cause serious harm to the reputation of the claimant”
